resources.string: Allows the user to enable and disable the recording of user steps over a time period. Recording will occur in the background until recording is stopped.

Allows the user to view basic profile information.
Profile information includes:
- Name
- Height
- Weight

Allows the user to view their current history during a particular time period.

History information includes:
-Steps
Allows the user to view their current fitness goals.
Signs out from the current Google account.

and disable the recording of
user steps over a time period.
Recording will occur in the
background until recording is
stopped.

Allows the user to view\ntheir current fitness goals.
Signs out from the current\nGoogle account.
No Goals Have Been Set Yet!
Press "Start Recording" to start recording steps. This will occur in the background, so you may lock your phone while using this. When done, press "Stop Recording" to finish recording your steps.
